TextLibrary.Text: Archery
Does damage equal to half your enemy's Yellow Mana
Your turn does not end if Yellow Mana is 15+
Battle Cry
Randomly creates a +5 Skull
Your turn does not end if Red Mana is 15+
Bone Avatar
Adds points equal to your Green Mana to your Battle skill
Reduces your Green Mana to zero
Bloodlust
Adds +12 to Red Mana
After receiving your mana, the turn ends
Banestorm
Destroys all Yellow Gems, and adds +1 to Air Mastery for each one
You gain full effect for each gem destroyed
Banequake
Destroys all Green Gems, and adds +1 to Earth Mastery for each one
You gain full effect for each gem destroyed
Banefire
Destroys all Red Gems, and adds +1 to Fire Mastery for each one
You gain full effect for each gem destroyed
Banefrost
Destroys all Blue Gems, and adds +1 to Water Mastery for each one
You gain full effect for each gem destroyed
Berserk Rage
Turns Red Gems into Skulls
Your turn does not end if Red Mana is 15+
Breathe Fire
Does 1 point of damage for every point of your Red Mana
Reduces your Red Mana to zero
Breathe Ice
Does 1 point of damage for every point of your Blue Mana
Reduces your Blue Mana to zero
Burial
Turns all Skulls and Gold Coins into Green Gems
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Breathe Plague
Does 1 point of damage for every point of your Yellow Mana and inflicts Disease for 20 turns
Reduces your Yellow Mana to zero
Breathe Poison
Does 1 point of damage for every point of your Green Mana and inflicts Poison for 20 turns
Reduces your Green Mana to zero
Besiege
Destroys a random 3x3 grid of gems
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Bone Strike
Reduces your enemy's Green Mana to 0
Your turn does not end if their Green Mana is 10+
Burn
Turns all Green Gems into Red Gems
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Cauterize
Adds +1 to Life Points for every Red Gem in play
Red Gems are not destroyed
Chaos Bolt
Does damage equal to the mana of a random Mana Reserve
The respective Mana Reserve is reduced to zero
Channel Air
Adds +5 to Yellow Mana
Your turn does not end
Channel Earth
Adds +5 to Green Mana
Your turn does not end
Channel Fire
Adds +5 to Red Mana
Your turn does not end
Charge!
Destroys a selected row of gems and does 5 points of damage
You gain the effects of every gem destroyed
Challenge
Adds +50% to damage on both players for 6 turns
Your turn does not end if Yellow Mana is 15+
Charm
All Skulls in play are destroyed
Adds +1 to Life Points for every Skull destroyed
Chivalry
Raises all Mana Reserves to full on both players
Removes all status effects on both players
Channel Water
Adds +5 to Blue Mana
Your turn does not end
Cleansing
Causes all gems in play to be cleared and replaced
After the board is reset, the turn ends
Call Lightning
Destroys a selected column of gems
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Calm
Removes all status effects on both players
Your turn does not end if Blue Mana is 10+
Cleave
Does 1 point of damage for every Yellow Gem in play
All Yellow Gems in play are destroyed
Consume Mana
Destroys all Mana Gems of a random color
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Conflagration
Turns all gems of the selected type into Red Gems
Any type can be selected, including Skulls or Gold
Courage
Removes all status effects on you
Your turn does not end if Blue Mana is 10+
Call the Horde
Destroys all Green and Red Gems
Adds +1 to Red Mana, Green Mana, and Life Points for every gem destroyed
Chill Touch
Reduces all your enemy's Mana Reserves by 3
Adds +5 to your Green Mana
Dark Bolt
Blinds the target for 2 turns
Also drains 5 points of Yellow and Red Mana
Deathbringer
Randomly creates Skulls equal to one third your Red Mana
No more than 10 Skulls will be created
Death Dive
Does 3 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every Yellow Gem in play
Death Gaze
Does damage equal to half of enemy's current Life Points
Randomly creates a Skull for every 5 damage done (max limit of 10).
Divine Right
Destroys all Purple Stars
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Double Roar
Turns all Yellow and Red Gems into Skulls
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Deathsting
Causes Poison on your enemy for 8 turns
Plus additional damage equal to your Red Mana
Duplicate
Duplicates an enemy item and gives it to you
The enemy item is not destroyed
Energize
Adds +25 to Life Points
Reduces your Mana Reserves to zero
Enrage
Adds your Red Mana total to your Battle skill for 8 turns.
Your turn does not end after casting this spell.
Entangle
Enemy loses 1 turn
Plus an additional turn for every 20 of your Green Mana
Earthpower
Destroys all Green Gems
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Eat Skulls
Destroys all Skulls, doing no damage for destroyed Skulls
Adds +1 to Battle for every Skull destroyed
Evaporate
Turns all Blue Gems into Yellow Gems
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Favor
Gives a 50% chance to add +1 to Life Points for each Experience point received
Lasts for 8 turns, plus an additional turn for every 6 of your Yellow Mana
Fireball
Destroys a selected 3x3 grid of gems, gaining full effects for all gems destroyed
Plus an additional 8 damage
Fire Bomb
Attaches a Firebomb to your opponent for 12 turns
If Red Mana is 12 or higher, the Firebomb explodes doing 5 damage
Fire Bolt
Does 4 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every 8 Red Mana
Frostbite
Does 1 point of damage for every Blue Gem in play
Destroys all Blue Gems
Flame Cannon
Explodes 4 random Gems on the grid, destroying other gems around them
You gain the effects of every gem destroyed
Flaming Avatar
Adds points equal to your Red Mana to a random Skill
Reduces your Red Mana to zero
Finger of Death
Turns a selected grid into a +5 Skull
After gem is transformed, the turn ends
Forest Fire
Does 6 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every 4 Red Mana
Freeze
Turns Red Gems into Blue Gems
Adds +1 to Blue Mana for every transformed gem
Fire Shield
Protects against 1 point of damage whenever you receive 2 or more damage
Lasts for 8 turns, plus an additional turn for every 3 of your Red Mana
Flaming Skulls
Turns Green Gems into Skulls
Turns Blue Gems into Red Gems
Fire Siphon
Reduces your enemy's Red Mana to zero
Adds +1 to Life Points for every Red Mana reduced
Gemberry
Adds +5 to Life Points
Plus an additional +1 for every 4 Blue Mana
Gust of Wind
Turns 5 random gems into Yellow Gems
Plus an additional gem for every 8 Yellow Mana
Haste
Does 4 points of damage to your enemy whenever you get an extra turn
Lasts for 10 turns, plus an additional turn for every 5 of your Yellow Mana
Headbutt
Destroys all Red Gems, and your enemy loses 1 turn
Plus an additional turn for every 8 Red Gems destroyed
Hurl Goblin
Destroys a random gem
You gain the gem's full effect plus 20x the gem's effect
Hide
Adds +100% to damage
Lasts until you receive damage
Hand of Power
Adds +2 to damage for 6 turns
This effect may be stacked two times
Heat Sink
Reduces your enemy's Red Mana by 8
and gives it to you
Howl
Adds +4 to Green Mana, and causes Fear for 5 turns
Plus an additional turn for every 5 Yellow Mana
Iron Strike
Destroys all Green Gems, and destroys all gems around Green Gems
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Knight Lord
Doubles the number of Purple Stars in play
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Lava Core
Adds +12 to maximum Red Mana
Your turn does not end
Light
Causes Blind on your enemy for 2 turns
Plus an additional turn for every 8 Yellow Mana
Lightning Storm
Destroys a selected column and the two adjacent columns
You gain the full effects for all gems destroyed
Mana Burn
Reduces your enemy's Mana Reserves by 5
Your turn does not end if Red Mana is 8+
Meteor Storm
Turns 8 random gems into Red Gems
You gain the full effects for all gems transformed
Nature's Wrath
Turns all Green gems into random Wildcards
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Paladin's Aura
Adds +2 to all Mana reserves at the beginning of each turn
Lasts 8 turns, plus an additional turn for every 5 Yellow Mana
Petrify
Enemy loses 2 turns
Plus an additional turn for every 20 of your Green Mana
Promotion
Turns all gems of the selected type into Purple Stars
Any type can be selected, including Skulls or Gold
Rabid Bite
Does 4 points of damage and causes Disease on your enemy for 5 turns
Plus an additional turn for every 5 Blue Mana
Revenant
Doubles your Battle skill
Your Battle returns to normal when combat is completed
Reinforcements
All Gold Coins in play are destroyed
Adds +1 to Life Points for every Gold Coin destroyed
Regeneration
Adds +4 to Life Points
Your turn does not end
Reincarnation
Turns all Purple Stars, Gold, and Skulls into random Mana Gems
You gain no effect for the gems transformed
Rend
Does 5 points of damage to enemy
Your turn does not end
Rain of Fire
Does 1 point of damage to enemy for every Red Gem in play
Destroys all Red Gems
Sanctuary
Adds +5 Resistance to a random mana type
Resistance lasts until the end of combat
Sense Blood
Destroys all Red and Blue Gems
Adds +2 Experience for each Gem destroyed
Singing Blades
Reduces your enemy's Mana Reserves by 4 whenever you do damage
Lasts for 5 turns, plus an additional turn for every 2 of your Yellow Mana
Submerge
Doubles your Blue Mana
Reduces your enemy's Yellow Mana by half
Scavenge
Destroys all Gold
You gain full effects for all gems destroyed
Stone Gaze
Turns Green Gems into Skulls
Your turn does not end if Green Mana is 15+
Sinkhole
Adds Green Mana to enemy equal to enemy's current Green Mana
Reduces your enemy's other Mana Reserves by half
Sneak Attack
Does 3 points of damage to enemy
Your turn does not end
Soar
Turns all Green and Blue Gems into Yellow Gems
Your turn does not end if Yellow Mana is 15+
Sword Of Bane
Does damage equal to your Green Mana
Reduces your Green Mana to zero
Sword Of Sirian
Does damage equal to your Yellow Mana
Drops your Yellow Mana to zero
Spin Attack
Destroys gems around a selected gem
You gain full effects for all gems destroyed
Spectral Force
Your enemy loses 3 turns
Does 10 points of damage to enemy if Blue Mana is 35+
Spit Poison
Causes Blind and Poison on your enemy
Lasts for 3 turns, plus an additional turn for every 12 Blue Mana
Soul Swap
Swaps mana reserves with your enemy
Does not end your turn
Steal
Reduces the enemy's Gold by 25, and gives it to you
This effect is permanent
Stomp!
Destroys all Green Gems, and your enemy loses 1 turn
You gain full effects for all gems destroyed
Stun
Does 5 points of damage to enemy, and your enemy loses 1 turn
Plus an additional +1 damage for every 8 Red Mana
Summon Tempest
Destroys 2 random columns of gems
You gain full effects for all gems destroyed
Swallow Whole
Does 4 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every 1 of enemy's Green Mana, unaffected by Battle
Swarm
Destroys all Yellow Gems
Adds +1 to Morale and Life Points for every gem destroyed
Swoop
Reduces your enemy's Yellow Mana by half
Your turn does not end if Yellow Mana is 14+
Taunt
Reduces a random Mana Reserve from enemy by 8
Plus an additional +1 for every 10 Yellow Mana
Thrust
Destroys a selected gem
You gain full effect for the gem destroyed
Thump!
Does 10 points of damage to the enemy
Unaffected by Battle
Throw Axe
Does 4 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every Skull in play
Trample
Does damage equal to half your Green Mana to enemy
Does 1 point of damage minimum
Tail Whip
Does 10 points of damage to enemy
Your turn does not end
Vampirism
Does 5 points of damage to enemy and gives it to you
Plus an additional +1 for every 10 Red Mana
Vigil
Adds +3 to all of your Mana Reserves whenever you match 4 or 5 gems
Lasts 8 turns, plus an additional turn for every 5 Blue Mana
Wing Buffet
Destroys all Yellow Gems, and your enemy loses 2 turns
Plus an additional turn for every 8 Yellow Gems destroyed
Web
Your enemy loses a turn
Plus an additional turn for every 12 Yellow Mana
Whirlwind
Destroys all Yellow Gems
You gain full effects for all gems destroyed
Wild Lore
Destroys all Yellow and Blue Gems
Adds +1 to Experience for every gem destroyed
Wild Magic
Turns 4 random gems into Wildcards
If all your Mana Reserves are 12+, your turn does not end
Wall of Fire
Damage is applied to Red Mana instead of Life Points
Lasts until Red Mana is zero and reduces your Red Mana by 2 per turn
Word of Power
Causes Stun for 2 turns and causes Blind for 6 turns
Causes Fear for 8 turns
Wall of Thorns
Applies damage to Green Mana instead of Life Points
Lasts until Green Mana is zero and reduces your Green Mana by 2 per turn
Wake the Dead
Turns 1 Skull into 1 +5 Skull for every 5 Green Mana
After gems are transformed, the turn ends
Zap
Does 5 points of damage to enemy
Plus an additional +1 for every 8 Red Mana
